title: Want to buy Snodgrass batting rare back
author: Maxjacks

posts.post_title: Want to buy Snodgrass batting rare back
posts.post_content:
Not looking for a polar bear as I already have one but open to what else is out there.
I have some decent stuff to trade for the right card but really looking to buy.
[url]maxjcards@gmail.com[/url] if you want to talk.
I'll also be at that national if you want to do an in person deal
